name: Protect Wakanda
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust T’Challa → remove Protect wakanda from the game. [hazard]

name: Duel
text: “The Wakanda abandoned me!” Characters other than Ghost Panther cannot remove threat from Duel. Ghost Panther cannot deal damage to enemies not engaged with him. (Ghost Panther’s nemesis side scheme)

name: Eric Killraven
text: Guard. When Revealed: Exhaust your identity. [star] Eric Killraven’s attacks gain piercing. (Ghost Panther’s nemesis minion.)

name: Bushmaster the Hunter
text: Patrol. When Revealed: Exhaust your identity. [star] Bushmaster the Hunter’s attacks gain overkill.

name: Hunter’s Prisonners
text: What now ? When Revealed: Each player find an ally and places it facedown beneath this scheme. Place X threat on this scheme where X is the total cost of all allies beneath it. Each player shuffles their deck. When Defeated: Return each ally beneath it to its owner's hand.

name: Finally Alone
text: When Revealed: if your nemesis minion is in play, it activates against you. Otherwise, this card gain surge.
